Mr. Speaker, I never liked the CHIPS Act because it directs cash  subsidies. Often, subsidizing last-generation technology leads to what  is going on right now. Should Intel give up 10 percent of its  ownership? What would happen if Intel were forced to break up? We might  end up with four or five creative, efficient, and cutting-edge  companies.…
